name: Father James and the Gabalfa Boys
name_original: Father James and the Gabalfa Boys
description:
RAGE!!! DESPAIR!!! INADEQUACY!!! 

Those are the only feelings you will have once you finish each of the three different endings

Father James and the Gabalfa Boys is a visual novel about a man's path of vengeance after encountering a horrific scene displaying that the depravity of this world will always exist as long as that man lives. In the form of various dramatis personae that make their marks along the way, that man will send his men to oppose the Father but he too won't be fighting alone...

Recommended playthrough = Northern route (Good End), Southern route (Bad End), and then Central route (True End) FEATURING
  • 7 chapters, ~1 hour long 
  • Unique end credits for each ending
  • 16.5k words
  • 17 characters with sprites
CONTENT WARNING
  • There's some death
  • Adult language and themes
  • Suggestive content
  • Reference to child and domestic abuse
  • Sudden loud noises
CREDITS

Character Designs: AdamsCartoonz @ Youtube / Instagram

Story and Programming: DuckyMoMo @ Twitter
